data.title: Study Abroad Program Options
data.text:
CSUCI International Programs offers programs in 18 countries around the world! Check out the overview of the types of programs available to CSUCI students, including definitions for frequently used study abroad terminology.

Semester and/or Yearlong Options (by Region/Country)

AFRICA

GHANA

Accra @ Univ. of Ghana - Fall, Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

SOUTH AFRICA

Port Elizabeth @ Nelson Mandela Univ. - Fall, Spring, Academic Year OR Calendar Year [CSUIP]

ASIA

JAPAN

Osaka @ Kindai Univ. - Spring [Exchange]

Tokyo @ Meiji Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [Exchange]

Tokyo @ Toyo Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [Exchange]

Tokyo @ Waseda Univ. - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Tsukuba @ Univ. of Tsukuba - Academic Year [CSUIP]

SOUTH KOREA

Seoul @ Korea Univ. - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Seoul @ Yonsei Univ.- Academic Year [CSUIP]

TAIWAN

CZECH REPUBLIC

Paris @ Paris School of Business (inquire here) - Fall OR Spring [Exchange]

GERMANY

Freiburg @ Univ. of Freiburg - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Freiburg @ Freiburg Univ. of Education - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Mannheim at Univ. of Mannheim - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Nürtingen at Nuertingen-Geislingen Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Oldenburg @ Univ. of Oldenburg (inquire here) - Spring OR Academic Year [Exchange]

Ravensburg @ Ravensburg-Weingarten Univ. of Applied Sciences - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Reutlingen @ Reutlingen Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Stuttgart @ Stuttgart Media Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Stuttgart @ Stuttgart State Academy of Art and Design - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Trossingen @ Trossingen Univ. of Music - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Tübingen @ Univ. of Tübingen - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Tübingen @ Language & Culture at Univ. of Tübingen - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Ulm @ Ulm Univ. of Applied Sciences - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP

Florence @ CSU Florence Center - Fall, Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

NORWAY

Birmingham @ Univ. of Birmingham - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Bristol @ Univ. of Bristol - Academic Year [CSUIP]

Swansea @ Swansea Univ. - Spring OR Academic Year [CSUIP]

Short-Term Options

Under review for 2024-25. Please check back for more information.

Types of Study Abroad Programs

[CSU IP] programs are open to all CSU students and managed by the CSU Chancellor's Office.

[Exchange] programs are partner university programs which are open to all CSUCI students. Students pay home campus tuition/fees.

[Direct Enroll] programs are where students pay tuition to the partner university.

[Provider] programs are independent study abroad organizations that administer a program.
